name: playsuit
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a single piece of clothing that consists of a top part joined to short or long trousers: Sara looked great in her black short playsuit.
/GettyImages
a single piece of clothing for babies and very young children consisting of a top part and trousers: The baby was dressed in a navy and white striped playsuit.
More examplesFewer examplesThe black strapless, chiffon playsuit wowed the crowd with its simplicity and elegance.I love this very on-trend short playsuit with a tie waist.It was warm enough for me to wear my frisky floral playsuit.He looked so cute in his little cotton playsuit.
